Hi, this is my personal website. It is under construction.

Hi, my name is Haru Kim. I am in my last semester at Williams College. I study Physics and Computer Science, broadly interested in the science of optimization. I do research at the Williams College Material Physics Lab advised by Prof. Kate Jensen.

Outside of my current research in physics, I am interested in thinking about utopias that people would actually want to live in.

Hosted on GitHub Pages using the Dinky theme
